name: Jiga
headline: Source better parts by partnering directly with vetted manufacturers
description:
Jiga partners you directly with vetted manufacturers so you can communicate and get competitive, reliable human quotes.

Our platform speeds up your workflow from request to delivery, so you can build great products faster than ever.

founders.name: Yonatan Wolowelsky, Founder
founders.description: Co Founder and CTO of Jiga

generated_description:
**Jiga: Streamlining Custom Parts Manufacturing**

Founded in 2020 and located in San Francisco, Jiga is shaking up the traditional manufacturing industry by making it easier for companies to source high-quality custom parts directly from vetted manufacturers. This approach not only fosters transparency but ensures that clients can communicate effectively, getting competitive and reliable quotes along the way.

### Mission and Vision
Jiga’s mission is clear: **to source better parts by partnering directly with manufacturers**. They eliminate the middlemen, making the entire process smoother and faster, from request to delivery.

### Key Features
Jiga’s platform offers an end-to-end workflow for custom parts sourcing:
- **CNC Machining**: Perfect for both simple and complex parts.
- **Sheet Metal Services**: Including bending and cutting, ideal for precise fabrications.
- **3D Printing**: With multiple techniques such as Fused Deposition Modeling and Selective Laser Sintering.
- **Injection Molding**: For mass production of plastic parts, including unique techniques like overmolding and insert molding.

Their user-friendly interface allows for quick quoting, tracking orders, and collaborating directly with suppliers. By removing friction in sourcing processes, users can build better products faster.

### Recognition and Backing
As part of the Y Combinator Batch W21, Jiga has gained significant traction and visibility. With a team of 15 and backed by Jared Friedman as their Group Partner, they are poised to disrupt the manufacturing supply chain.

### Customer Testimonials
Users rave about Jiga's unique value proposition of direct communication with manufacturers, leading to fewer errors and stronger partnership satisfaction. With an emphasis on reliability and high-quality service, it's no wonder they're earning high praise in the manufacturing sector.

### Conclusion
In an environment where sourcing parts can often feel overwhelming, Jiga simplifies the landscape, making sourcing more efficient and less costly. If you're in search of a reliable solution to your custom manufacturing needs, **Jiga is your go-to platform** to both save time and improve quality. 

For more insights or to get started on your project, visit [Jiga's website](https://jiga.io).
